pages.title: Nutrition Vat
pages.text: The <item>nutrition vat/$ has two purposes: It can preserve items which can <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/spoilage)spoil/$ but are damaged by freezing and it can duplicate <item>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryos/$, making it part of the <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning)cloning process/$.$(br2)It stores a single <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/spoilage)perishable/$ item, draining Nutrient Solution but preventing the item

from <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/spoilage)spoiling/$. It can't store items which can be safely frozen without penalty.$(br2)While it has nutrient solution, it will also create <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/spoilage)fresh/$ copies of the stored <item>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryo/$.$(br2)Cloning <item>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryos/$ is free, unless the <item>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryo/$ has special <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning#traits)traits/$. Each permanent potion effect requires 1 <item>mutagen/$, and <thing>$(l:crossroads:witchcraft/cloning#traits)respawning

<bobo>and sumtyng pokey dat takie-awayie crimsunie-goopy~goop$(br2)<bobo>&nd suhmtng shiney-wimey-greenie-monie-rok$(br2)
